work_habits.meeting_preferences: limits meetings to ≤2 hours per week; prefers brief stand‑ups and agenda‑driven sessions; virtual preferred, quarterly in‑person
work_habits.work_environment: Hybrid (2 days in office, 3 days remote)

personality.decision_making_approach: data‑driven with stakeholder input; uses cost‑benefit analysis
personality.stress_management_approach: scheduled breaks, 30‑minute daily walk, mindfulness app, regular gym sessions
personality.conflict_resolution_style: collaborative problem‑solving; aims for win‑win outcomes

availability.travel_flexibility: up to 15 % of time (~6 weeks/year) for client site visits

personal_factors.caregiving_responsibilities: Morning school drop‑offs; occasional evening school events
personal_factors.commute_situation: 30‑minute drive to office on hybrid days
personal_factors.health_considerations: Mild hypertension; monitors via wearable; exercises 3 times/week
personal_factors.career_motivation: Aiming for Director of IT Operations; passionate about leading digital transformation initiatives

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: bi‑weekly team sync, daily 15‑min stand‑up, ad‑hoc as needed
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: writes post‑mortems, runs monthly lunch‑and‑learns, maintains internal wiki

risk_factors.potential_bottlenecks: over‑reliance on his deep AWS expertise; may cause delays if unavailable
burnout_risk_factors: limited personal time during major migrations
chronic health condition requiring regular monitoring
